title: Real Madrid Presents 2023 / 24 Home Kit With adidas
body_text:
Real Madrid Unites Its Fans and Players With 2023/24 Home Jersey
Coming with a “family photo” that brings together the different core members of the club.
Real Madrid and adidas have just presented their new home jersey for the 2023/24 season and it celebrates the minimalist and all-white aesthetic that has connected fans and players of the club for over a century.
The all-white jersey of the Spanish super club has become synonymous with Madrid as the squad has gone on to become one of the most decorated clubs in the world. With this in mind, the 14-time Champions League winner’s new kit takes on an understated design, with the predominately white color scheme being complemented by speckles of yellow and a navy layered crew neck flat knit collar, while a bold navy stripe runs vertically down the side.
However, while the new jersey for Madrid seems like an updated version of a classic, the strip features a first-of-its-kind feature: a detailed inclusion of the club’s slogan, “¡Hala Madrid!” on the collar — a battle cry which often rings around the terraces of the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium.
Furthermore, both the on-field and fan version of the shirts are made with 100% recycled materials, while the on-field iteration of the shirt is optimized with HEAT.RDY technology that uses advanced materials to increase airflow to make players feel cool. Meanwhile, the fan version of the kit comes with sweat-wicking and absorbent AEROREADY materials to keep the body feeling dry.
In celebration of the new jersey and its ability to unite, the latest Madrid drop is marked with a “family photo,” and it brings together members of Real Madrid’s men’s and women’s football teams along with its women’s basketball athletes, representatives from its youth academies, and players from its Genuine team who compete in the La Liga Genuine.
You can check out the new Real Madrid jersey above and you will be able to see it for the first time IRL when the club begins its pre-season tour across the United States. The jersey is also available to shop now via the official Real Madrid webstore and with adidas retailers.
